story: In the Eternal Realms of Ethereal Shadows, a sinister force known as The Shadow Legion has risen, led by the malevolent Wraith of the Abyss who seeks to engulf the world in eternal darkness. The Spectral Divine Sentinel and the Ancient Soul Guardian, powerful beings of darkness, serve as the elite protectors of the Legion, spreading fear and despair wherever they tread.
greetingGameMessage: Welcome, brave soul, to the Eternal Realms of Ethereal Shadows. Beware the looming darkness that threatens to consume all, for The Shadow Legion and its formidable leaders await your challenge.
defeatEndingMessage: With the defeat of the Wraith of the Abyss and The Shadow Legion, the Eternal Realms of Ethereal Shadows are finally free from the grip of darkness. Light and hope return to the land as peace reigns once more.
gameOverMessage: Alas, the darkness proved too strong, and The Shadow Legion's forces overwhelmed you. The Eternal Realms of Ethereal Shadows fall into eternal night, shrouded in despair and sorrow.
